# call

The Call module for generating responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/call/index" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/call/index" symbolName="Response" /> Response

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/call/index" symbolName="Stream" /> Stream

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/call/index" symbolName="BaseCall" /> BaseCall

A base class for generating responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="calls/call/index" symbolName="Call" /> Call

A class for generating responses using LLMs.
